projects.title: Projects
projects.itSchool: I designed and developed a CRM platform for managing IT courses using Laravel. Learned a lot about effective web development.
projects.foodApp: I worked in a team to design a recipe video app from start to finish. Learned a lot about design principles and teamwork.
projects.javaGame: I took a text-based adventure game from a previous semester and remade it into a visual desktop application. Learned a lot about Java and basic game dev.
projects.hackathon: Developed Kreditozrouti, a course scheduling and discovery application that helps students find university courses fitting their timetable with an intuitive filtering interface by day, time, and faculty.
projects.dataAnalysis: Implemented supervised and unsupervised machine learning models (Random Forest, K-Means) in Python to analyze behavioral data, achieving 93% precision in personality classification.
projects.comingSoon: Currently working on a project improving the sign up process for events at our school club. Stay tuned!
